Articles.Content:
I am currently building a space station. I am at the stage now where I have docked the 6 primary structure units together. When I went up to dock the next part (a science lab), I got no magnetic attraction between the docking ports and could not dock. I have tried several times since and am still getting no luck. The docking ports I am using are clamp-o-tron seniors. To save you time the problem isn't due to noob errors such as backwards ports etc . Any suggestions?

Thanks

Give this a try. It worked for me.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/78863-FIX-Dock-Undocking-Bug-in-0-23-5
